articles.title: Writers union ratifies its new contract with Hollywood and TV studios - CNN
articles.description: Members of the Writers Guild of America union ratified a new contract with Hollywood and television studios, the WGA said in a statement released Monday.
articles.content:
Members of the Writers Guild of America union ratified a new contract with Hollywood and television studios, the WGA said in a statement released Monday.

articles.title: Everything you need to know about the solar eclipse in Texas and where to get free glasses - Austin American-Statesman
articles.description: NASA projects the eclipse will be visible across North America, Central America, and South America, including parts of the U.S. and Mexico.
articles.content:
An annular solar eclipse will be visible across the Western Hemisphere this weekend, and some Americans will be able to see it including Austinites, NASA is predicting.

articles.title: ‘Finish them’: Nikki Haley, top Indian-Americans denounce Hamas attack on Israel - India Today
articles.description: Republican presidential candidate Nikki Haley called on Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu to “finish them (Hamas)” after the Palestinian militant group's unprecedented attack that has claimed hundreds of lives.
